TERM: Data Storage and Management

DEFINITION:
Data Storage and Management: Cloud Storage:

Distributed File Systems:

Data Warehousing:

By integrating advanced data storage and management technologies into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to efficiently store and retrieve large amounts of data, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of advanced networking and communication technologies to enable the system to communicate with other systems and devices.

Confidence: 2.745
